title: RIOT POINTS
body:
It came to my attention that it was pretty silly that you couldnt gift YOUR personal RP to someone. I have an older sister that does not play anymore and she has 400 RP left. I asked if i could have her account and she said yes so i tried taking the RP... turns out i have to buy it. Riot please make it that you can send YOUR PERSONAL RP to a friend of family member.


-Toby :D

replies.body: The problem with that is that some trolls might go and make more accounts. Then they get 400 free RP to shift{{champion:154}}. Its a shame, my friend has lots of RP that he wouldnt mind sharing.
